title: Recent advances in rational design for high-performance potassium-ion batteries
content:
Chem. Soc. Rev., 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D3CS00601H, Review Article
Yifan Xu, Yichen Du, Han Chen, Jing Chen, Tangjing Ding, Dongmei Sun, Dong Ha Kim, Zhiqun Lin, Xiaosi Zhou
Recent progress in rational structural regulation for high-efficiency potassium-ion batteries is reviewed.
To cite this article before page numbers are assigned, use the DOI form of citation above.
